name: Monster Crush
description: Monster Candy Crush is a fun match3 puzzle game with new features. All you have to do is to swipe and match 3 or more monster candies of the same color. Try to match 4 or 5 similar monsters and you will get a surprising new speciel candy. Explore Many levels and missions that will blow your mind. the game is easy to play and hard to master. CLick start and begin the matching adventure
